Text: this is a great compilation, and i like the idea..i've been meaning to put one together myself.  unfortunately it's hard to distinguish which of these mixes are genuine;  if they're ripped from actual cds then the cds themselves are labeling something common as rare..one listen to 'i feel fine' and you can tell that's real stereo, or the germans have some magical mystery technique that can generate true stereo from a mono source : )  still;  that's a fair deal of work you put into this, and i thank ya kindly.
